name: Salvigo
tag_list: marketing-agency, startup-marketing, business-planning, strategy-planning, email-marketing, revenue-creation, lead-generation, business-development, appointment-setting, seo, b2b-marketing, pay-per-lead, b2b-lead-generation, pay-per-appointment, b2c-telem
overview:
is a full service outsourced marketing, lead generation agency specialising in B2B.

We are specialists in lead generation and appointment setting solutions for start-ups, SMEs companies with fast growth aspirations. Our 16 strong team on average generate over 300 opportunities for our clients on a monthly basis, opening more doors for them into some of the world’s leading brands.

We maintain a data base of over 200k senior decision makers in marketing, finance, creative, digital, internal communications, PR, human resources, ecommerce and learning and development to name a few.

Our approach goes beyond just telemarketing, we use online and offline channels to target decision makers on behalf of our clients, the net result is better quality meetings, faster, with a more measurable outcome.

Specialties Marketing Agency, Startup Marketing, Business Planning, Strategy Planning, Email Marketing, Revenue Creation, Lead Generation, Business Development, Appointment Setting, SEO, B2B Marketing, Pay Per Lead, B2B Lead Generation, Pay Per Appointment, B2C Telemarketing
